this demonstrates that the n terminal _METHOD_ tethered to the _BLANKL_ by _PROTEIN_ or _BLANKP_ is facing the cytoplasm indicating that the n terminus of picc and picl faces the cytoplasm . together these data suggest that _BLANKP_ and _BLANKP_ are _LOCATION_ localized tail anchored proteins with the n terminal long coiled coil domains facing the cytoplasm .
